I love cheap gasoline, ROAD TRIP !!
This is what the world needs, cheap energy brings prosperity. Cheap energy and renewable just don't go together yet unfortunately.

@Ulrichard: no cheap oil is the normal, only reason oil was expensive is because of shale oil been expensive and the OPEC deal that prevented competition from other countries that can produce oil far cheaper.
On average international markets produce oil at 15 to 28 dollers a barrel. Shale producers require 50 to 60 a barrel.
